com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.mod

Class JsRegisteredClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.mod.JsRegisteredClass
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BiomeRegistry, BlockRegistry, Blocks, Chat, ChatColour, ChatMessage, CommandRegistry, CraftingRecipe, CraftRegistry, EventBus, ItemRegistry, Items, LanguageRegistry, MinecraftClassWrapper, Mod, ModRegistry, PluginManager, TextureManager, TileEntityRegistry, Time, Type, WorldGenRegistry

    public class JsRegisteredClass
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents and is used to register Java classes that can be used as interfaces for the Javascript engine
    Author:
    pcr3w

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsRegisteredClass() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void registerClass(java.lang.Class<? extends JsRegisteredClass> clazz)
      Tries to register the given class as a Javascript interface class
      static void registerUtilClass(java.lang.Class clazz)
      Tries to register the given class as a Javascript interface utility class.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JsRegisteredClass

        public JsRegisteredClass()

    • Method Detail

      • registerClass

        public static void registerClass(java.lang.Class<? extends JsRegisteredClass> clazz)
                          throws java.io.InvalidClassException
        Tries to register the given class as a Javascript interface class
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to register
        Throws:
        java.io.InvalidClassException - If the class provided is not allowed to be registered

      • registerUtilClass

        public static void registerUtilClass(java.lang.Class clazz)
                              throws java.io.InvalidClassException
        Tries to register the given class as a Javascript interface utility class. This differs from a standard interface class in that the class does not have to extend JsRegisteredClass.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to register
        Throws:
        java.io.InvalidClassException - If the class provided is not allowed to be registered
